|name= Billett Potter

|occupation= Photographer

'''Billet Genn Potter''' is a British photographer. His photographs include Oxford landmarks and notable personalities such as [[W.H. Auden]], [[wikipedia:Noam Chomsky|Noam Chomsky]], [[wikipedia:Karl Popper|Karl Popper]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>[http://www.checkcompany.co.uk/director/6253338/-BILLETT-GENN-POTTER Billett Genn Potter] at checkcompany.co.uk (accessed 4 June 2023)</ref> Notably, his photographs of J.R.R. Tolkien have served as covers for many books, including several editions of [[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]] and [[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]].
==External links==
* [https://tolkienlibrary.com/tolkien-book-store/clp0159.php An original photograph with a dedication by Tolkien to Patrick Hunt] on TolkienLibrary.com
